Decorate your eating table with a small plant inside a cube. It is small and fits even on a small nightstand or something similar.
If you have some space in your bathroom then this would be a perfect fit for this empty place.
Bring in something different and order your books in another way then normal.
Your kitchen looks empty and boring? Decorate your walls with some fruit, plant or vegatable pictures. It alsways looks fresh and modern.
